mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_statistics (blog_id, comment_count, view_count, reply_comment_count, collect_count, complain_count, share_count, admire_count, like_count, word_count, release_date) VALUE (#{blogId}, ifnull(#{commentCount}, 0), ifnull(#{viewCount}, 0), ifnull(#{replyCommentCount}, 0), ifnull(#{collectCount}, 0), ifnull(#{complainCount}, 0), ifnull(#{shareCount}, 0), ifnull(#{admireCount}, 0), ifnull(#{likeCount}, 0), ifnull(#{wordCount}, 0), NOW())
mapper.update:
UPDATE blog_statistics
comment_count=#{commentCount},
view_count=#{viewCount},
reply_comment_count=#{replyCommentCount},
collect_count=#{collectCount},
complain_count=#{complainCount},
share_count=#{shareCount},
admire_count=#{admireCount},
like_count=#{likeCount}
word_count=#{wordCount}
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select s.id, s.blog_id, s.comment_count, s.word_count, s.view_count, s.reply_comment_count, s.collect_count, s.complain_count, s.share_count, s.admire_count, s.like_count, s.release_date from blog_statistics s left join blog b on s.blog_id = b.id left join blogger_account a on a.id = b.blogger_id where a.id = #{value}
